name: Zesty Stuffed Chicken
author: CHEFBOYARMED
summary: I was experimenting and wanted to try something new and this turned out to be very delicious.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded pepper Jack cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Mix shrimp, pepper Jack cheese, yellow bell pepper, and green onion together in a bowl
Place chicken thighs skin-side up on a cutting board
Pound with a meat mallet until somewhat flattened
Pack an even amount of the shrimp mixture over each chicken thigh
Roll up chicken; wrap tightly with bacon slices
Transfer rolls to a large baking pan
Bake in the preheated oven until juices run clear from chicken and bacon is crisp, about 45 minutes
